Html:
I'm having some issues trying to configure the run-as user and settings for a new task. Say I want to create a task that runs as SYSTEM, what would the properties look like for this? Also, if I wanted to run this as a domain service account, how would I configure that? You examples page only seems to have an example of an interactive user logon.

Thanks!
Try looking at this examples page: https://taskscheduler.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TaskSecurity
